article.heading: THE VIOLENCE OF THE NEW THE BEST INVENTIONS SPRING FROM NECESSITY, NOT TECHNOLOGY

1.quote: He often claimed that his biggest single contribution to the development of practical electronics was his sand-exluding technology for electrical relays... stretching a condom over them.

2.quote: Inventors, that name we'd almost forgotten in our haste to adopt marketing buzzwords, are on the rise again. Inventors- people who spot needs and then get out the toilet rolls and sticky-backed plastic to nail the theory.
